article_title: Catholic Soy Milk Mogul Won't Cover Drugs That 'Prevent Procreation'

article_metadata.description: Remember in the hours following Hobby Lobby's Supreme Court victory, when some pundits suggesting there'd be few similar cases? Soy milk mogul Michael Potter sued the government to block contraceptives for his workers since 2013. Now the court is listening.
article_metadata.author: Clare O'Connor

og.description: Remember in the hours following Hobby Lobby's Supreme Court victory, when some pundits suggesting there'd be few similar cases? Soy milk mogul Michael Potter sued the government to block contraceptives for his workers since 2013. Now the court is listening.
